Package datamodel.categories

Interface Category<T>

Type Parameters:
T - A generic type
All Superinterfaces:
Model<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ModelCategory
public interface Category<T>
extends Model<T>
An interface that exposes the services for saving categories of data and its counts. For example "Color" could be a category, and can have the labels "blue", "green" and "yellow". We also assume that there is a fixed number of categories and that every category is related with each other (ex: combination of "Shape" and "Color") kind of like relationships between father and son
Since:
2020-05-06
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Marcelo Jacinto, David Souto, Gonçalo Tomás
See Also:
Model, ModelClassfication, ModelCategory, TreeAugmentedNayveBayes

    • getNijkc

      int getNijkc​(int i, int j, int k, int c, int parentNode)
      A method that should return the N_ijkc counts
      Parameters:
      i - An int with the node index that we are considering
      j - An int with the configuration of the parent of that node
      k - An int with the configuration of the node
      c - An int with the configuration of the classification
      parentNode - An int with the parent of the node
      Returns:
      An int with the counts for that combination
